backend/main.mo: Defines types for programs, KPIs, users, and teams plus comparison utilities, and sets up authorization via an access control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for many frontend files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes and global style resets.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling auth, profile setup, theme, and routing to Dashboard.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Dashboard metrics and charts computed from programs and KPIs with loading skeletons and visual summaries.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable delete confirmation dialog using AlertDialog with Cancel/Delete actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with branding, copyright, and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with logo, theme toggle, user profile dropdown, and logout handling. Fetches user data and displays initials, name, and role.
frontend/src/components/KpiFormDialog.ts: Provides a form dialog for creating or editing KPI entries, initializing form state and submitting data via mutations. Handles related program and team member selection.
frontend/src/components/KPIsTab.tsx: Displays and filters KPI data with search, status, period, and team filters. Supports creating, editing, and deleting KPIs based on user permissions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a mandatory modal for first‑time users to enter their name and role. Saves the profile using a mutation and disables closing until completion.
frontend/src/components/program-calendar: Renders a legend showing color-coded calendar categories.
Utilities for category colors and computing per-day counts for programs, agendas, and KPIs.
Error boundary that displays a fallback UI and reset button when the calendar view fails.
Clickable calendar day cell showing date and category indicators with density options.
Side or bottom panel listing programs active on a selected day with details and click handling.
Toggle buttons to switch between comfortable and compact calendar grid density.
Button group to switch between month, week, day, and agenda calendar views.
Drawer displaying full program details with optional edit action.
Functions to filter programs by fields and count programs active on a given day.
Maps status and priority values to display labels and style configs.
Builds a 14‑day agenda list by grouping programs, agenda items, and KPIs by day and rendering them with click handling.
Filters and displays all programs, agenda items, and KPIs occurring on a single day with badges and program click support.
Generates a month grid with per‑day counts of programs, agenda items, and KPIs and renders them via DayCell components.
Builds a week grid view showing daily category counts and clickable DayCell entries.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCalendarT: Implements a full program calendar with month, week, day, and agenda views, filters, reminders, and program editing. Computes visible ranges and loads calendar data based on view mode.
Wraps the calendar tab with an error boundary that shows a fallback UI and allows retrying. On reset, invalidates calendar‑related queries and reloads the tab.
frontend/src/components/ProgramFormDialo: Dialog form for creating or editing a program, managing form state, loading team members by division, and submitting mutations.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: Renders a program card with description, priority/status badges, details, and edit/delete/view actions.
frontend/src/components/ProgramsTab.tsx: Programs overview tab with filtering, sorting, search, and actions to view, edit, create, or delete programs.
frontend/src/components/RelatedProgramCo: Popover-based combobox letting users search and select a related program from a list.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: Reports tab that filters programs and KPIs by team, division, and priority, and supports exporting report data.
frontend/src/components/team/ManagerSele: Provides a select dropdown to choose a manager, excluding the current member and supporting 'no manager' selection.
frontend/src/components/team/PhotoUrlPre: Previews a remote photo URL with avatar fallback, load/error state, and basic validation.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamFunctio: Displays a selectable team member node with avatar/initials and name/role text.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamMemberC: Displays a team member card with avatar upload, edit/delete handlers, and photo validation using upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamMemberD: Shows a slide-out panel with full team member details, including manager and direct reports.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamStructu: Renders a hierarchical organization node with selectable member info and recursively drawn child nodes.
Builds and displays a functional team structure with hierarchy warnings and a member detail panel.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing a team member, including avatar upload, manager selection, and validation.
frontend/src/components/TeamMembersTab.t: Team members management tab with search, filtering, card/structure views, and create/edit/delete actions.
Admin-only UI to list user profiles and change their roles with loading and permission states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
Periodically checks programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines to trigger deduplicated time-based toast reminders.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: React hook that returns whether a given CSS media query matches, with event-listener updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors to manage user profiles, admin actions, programs, KPIs, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and custom utility classes like gradients and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page rendering tabs for overview, calendar, programs, KPIs, team, reports, and user management depending on admin status.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with UI for initiating Internet Identity login and displaying login progress.
frontend/src/utils/imageUpload.ts: Utility for uploading images to ImgBB or Imgur with size checks, progress reporting, and fallback handling.
frontend/src/utils/reminderDedup.ts: Manages deduplication of shown reminders using localStorage with 48‑hour expiry and utilities to check or mark reminders.
frontend/src/utils/safeBrowserStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers around localStorage and sessionStorage for JSON and string values with graceful fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/teamFunctionalStructu: Collects hierarchy members, groups them by division, and offers name‑sorting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/teamHierarchy.ts: Builds a team hierarchy with cycle and missing‑manager detection, returning roots, orphans, and warnings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/urlValidation.ts: Validates HTTP/HTTPS URLs, including a strict HTTPS‑only check.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining colors, spacing, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state file listing calendar UX requirements, known issues, and existing features for planning.
